price: 107. Rabbigayow! Naga bixi xaggeeda (Naarta); haddaan u noqonno (xumaan fal), innagaa daalimiin (gar ma qaatayaal) ah.”
arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā akhrij'nā min'hā fa-in ʿud'nā fa-innā ẓālimūna
